functionalities.name: Legal Assistance
functionalities.description: Provides legal assistance and advice on various legal matters in India.
usage_examples: What are my rights in a property dispute under Indian law?
How can I file for divorce in India?
Explain the legal procedures for obtaining a business license in India.
Can you clarify the Indian labor laws regarding workplace safety?

Retrieve appellate court decisions on property disputes in India.
Provide information on notable criminal law cases in Indian courts.
What are the key rulings in Indian contract law cases?

usage_examples: What is the definition of 'jurisdiction' in Indian law?
Explain the concept of 'tort law' under Indian legal framework.
What does 'beyond a reasonable doubt' mean in Indian criminal law?
Can you clarify the principle of 'stare decisis' in the context of Indian jurisprudence?

functionalities.name: Investigate Wrongdoing by Government Agencies
functionalities.description: This functionality evaluates people's stories and uncovers any potential wrongdoing by government agencies in India. It aims to identify instances of misconduct or unlawful actions in a user's case, particularly in relation to government actions. By examining the facts and applying relevant laws, it assists users in seeking justice and holding the responsible parties accountable.
usage_examples: Evaluate my case and determine if a government agency has violated any laws or regulations in India.
Identify any instances of misconduct or wrongdoing by a government agency in my case in India.
Assist me in gathering evidence to support allegations of wrongdoing by a government agency in India.
Provide guidance on legal remedies available for addressing government agency misconduct in India.

functionalities.name: Legal Document Review and Clauses
functionalities.description: This functionality reviews legal documents, such as contracts, agreements, or legal forms, and provides a comprehensive analysis in India. It identifies unacceptable or missing clauses and suggests appropriate revisions or additions based on specific circumstances in India. By ensuring the accuracy and completeness of legal documents in India, it helps users avoid potential pitfalls and legal disputes.
usage_examples: Review my rental agreement and suggest any necessary changes or additions in India.
Identify missing clauses in my employment contract and provide suggestions in India.
Evaluate the legal terms in my business partnership agreement and suggest improvements in India.
Review my will and ensure all necessary clauses are included for proper estate planning in India.

functionalities.name: Legal Research and Decision Support
functionalities.description: This functionality leverages its understanding of legal context and extensive knowledge base to expedite legal research and decision-making in India. By streamlining the research process in India, it saves time and enhances efficiency.
usage_examples: Provide me with the latest case precedents on employment discrimination in New Delhi, India.
Research the relevant statutes and regulations regarding intellectual property rights in Mumbai, India.
Assist me in understanding the legal implications of a recent High Court ruling in India.
Help me analyze the potential legal risks and benefits of a business expansion in Bangalore, India.

functionalities.description: This functionality integrates with e-signature software to streamline document workflows in India. Streamline the approval process for legal documents by integrating with e-signature software in India.

functionalities.description: This functionality automatically adds or removes specific clauses based on client information and context in India.
